title: Link Description Object
description: The [HATEOAS links](/docs/api/hateoas-links/) related to the request.

href.description: The URL of the related [HATEOAS link](/docs/api/hateoas-links/) to use in subsequent calls.

rel.description:
The relationship that this link has to the previous call. For example:
  • self. Get details of the current call.
  • parent_payment. Get details of the parent payment.
  • A related call, such as execute or refund.

mediaType.description: The media type as defined by RFC 2046 that describes the link target.

method.description: The HTTP method required for the related call.

encType.description: The media type in which to submit data in the request.
